title: One or more validation errors occurred.

To: A distinct recipient party for the delegation, could not be identified by the supplied attributes. A recipient can be identified by either a single urn:altinn:organizationnumber or urn:altinn:enterpriseuser:username attribute, or a combination of urn:altinn:person:identifier-no and urn:altinn:person:lastname attributes, urn:altinn:person:username and urn:altinn:person:lastname attributes or urn:altinn:systemuser:uuid attribute.
